title: 1.5 bath - Updated, Parking, Great Location!
posting_body: "Spacious, updated, 3 bed / 1.5 Bath apartment with an eat-in kitchen with granite countertops and a dishwasher!
Well managed 3-flat with in-building-laundry, a big back yard, and an exterior tandem parking space which can accommodate 2 cars for only $100 per month!
Great Avondale location (Wellington and Kimball) that offers easy access to: the Blue Line, the highway, restaurants, cafes and pubs of Milwaukee Ave!
Please note: 1) Solid Credit (675) Required. 2)  Cats considered; no dogs. )
Call or text (847-347-3293) today; great places don't last long!
Raider Realty works all over the city, but our core areas are: Logan Square, Avondale and East Humboldt Park."
